Thank you for the bug report.
Are all the Ant preferences set to the default?
Are you using an external Ant install or the Ant shipped with Eclipse?

everything is default, ant shipped with eclipse. I had the same error with a really simple java project and a selfmade build.xml last week. stepped back to callisto for now. know itsnot really reproducable but annoying it is. europa looks not that good to me up to now overall.
Hello I found out that some other plugin changed my settings for ANT_HOME in eclipse to an older version of ant. I resetted ANT_HOME and everything is fine.

Thank you for reporting back.
